definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: A market place where illegal or hard-to-get items are sold or where money is illegally exchanged.
sentences.chinese: 非法或紧俏物资的销售点，或者非法换汇的地方。

sentences.english: Overprinting foils makes for truly eye-catching features at the point of sale.
sentences.chinese: 套印箔使真正意义上醒目在销售点的功能。

sentences.english: If there is standardization in point-of-sale card scanning and reading, it can.
sentences.chinese: 如果有规范，在销售点扫描卡和阅读，它可以。

sentences.english: I am looking for EPOS systems for retails supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: 我正在寻找电子销售点系统的零售连锁超市。

sentences.english: Introduction of electronic point-of-sale systems is improving efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 引进销售点电子系统提高了效率。

sentences.english: A market place where illegal or hard-to-get items are sold or where money is illegal exchanged.
sentences.chinese: 非法或紧俏物资的销售点，或者非法换汇的地方。

sentences.english: Promoting products through development of Point-of-Purchase displays.
sentences.chinese: 通过改善在销售点的商品陈列做促销。

sentences.english: This ensures simple handling of dollies and their corresponding product at the point of sale.
sentences.chinese: 这将确保简单处理推车及其相应的产品在销售点。

sentences.english: You can go to the transport card sales point to get a new one.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去一卡通销售点去换个新的。

sentences.english: I hire magicians to perform at these locations and to sell our products.
sentences.chinese: 在这些销售点，我请了一些魔术师来表演和销售。

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
retail department/section of a retail store
